div.div: Please see recent information regarding the coronavirus below.
Our programs, activities and commitments to educating tomorrow’s citizens benefits our students, our community and our district.

div.p: Tuesday April, 7th from 8:30am to 10:30am and from 12:30pm to 2:30pm at Byesville Elementary. Please use the lunch pick up line and procedures to pick up the registration packet.
Tuesday April, 14th from 8:30am to 10:30am and from 12:30pm to 2:30pm at Byesville Elementary. Please use the lunch pick up line and procedures to drop off the completed registration packet.

div.class: et_pb_with_border et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_3 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light

div.p: Wednesday April, 8th from 8:30am to 10:30am and from 12:30pm to 2:30pm at Secrest Elementary. Please use the lunch pick up line and procedures to pick up the registration packet.
Wednesday April, 15th from 8:30am to 10:30am and from 12:30pm to 2:30pm at Secrest Elementary. Please use the lunch pick up line and procedures to drop off the completed registration packet.

div.div: The safety of our staff and students is of the utmost importance during this time. Please see the information below regarding ways to decrease the spread of the coronavirus. For more information, access the Center for Disease Control’s full publication here or navigate to the CDC’s website.
